Description: The Stanley STHT83179 Quick Vise is ideal for DIY and hobbyist projects. Rather than a traditional hand crank, the quick vise utilizes a slide for quick, easy positioning and a lever for tightening. 2 built-in screw threads securely hold the vise to work surfaces and provide easy repositioning. A 4.5 in. jaw slides to open and close quickly and weighing only 3.5 lbs. the Quick Vise is also easy to transport.

Description: Rotates in all directions. Made of die-cast zinc. Easily clamps to workbenches and tables of up to 2 3/8 in. (60 mm). Alternatively, use 2 standard screws to secure to the work surface.
